name: Xiao - La voix du pouvoir
description:
Xiao - La Voix du Pouvoir is a semi-realistic role-playing game.

This project was created in 3 weeks and based on the movie "Spartacus" made by Stanley Kubrick.

In a matriarchal China, Xia, the empress' sister, dreams of freedom and equality. To achieve this, she chooses to lead the slaves to rebellion, then to overthrow the system and establish parity.

The player has to fight enemies in turn by turn. Before fighting them, he must first get information from the NPCs by talking to them to find out the weaknesses of the enemies, but be careful, there are honest and lying NPCs. Once this information is gathered, the player can attack the enemy based on the information previously obtained by the NPCs. There is also an exploration part where the player can find equipment and evolve.
